about_list.title: Lattice Education Competence Center
about_list.content:
LEC2 helps you to use the available FPGA technology from Lattice Semiconductor effectively. We turn engineers and technicians into FPGA experts.

Our structured and extensive training program imparts the know-how for the entire development process – from conception to physical implementation, and helps you face these challenges. Securing the future through qualification with leading experts.

Competently imparted first-hand knowledge is becoming more and more essential for the successful use of new technologies. Only well-trained employees can cope with the demands placed on them in the time allotted.

about_list.title: Krassin Consulting GmbH
about_list.content:
Some FPGA manufacturers established on the market have undertaken a massive realignment of their business models and thus also of their technology offerings, especially in recent years. Already available FPGA technologies, but also new FPGA architectures planned, are aimed at complex, computationally intensive and power-hungry applications of the highest performance.

These areas of application are especially designed for High-End applications in data centers. However, the need for e.g. data center applications on the European and worldwide market is rather low compared to industrial applications with demand for lower complexities.

The discrepancy between the supply of High-End FPGAs and low complexity FPGAs with low power consumption -which are still required to a large extent in the industry- is growing ever greater.

To close the aforementioned gap, Krassin Consulting GmbH has designed a training program together with Lattice Semiconductor Inc. to train and support industrial users specifically in this area. Lattice Semiconductor is the low power programmable leader.

They solve customer problems across the network, from the edge to the cloud, in the growing communications, computing, industrial, automotive, and consumer markets.
